style: font-size: 14px;color: #166B83;background-color: #9BD6E6;left: 50px;top: 80px;width: 82px;height: 66px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;font-weight: bold;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #614023;background-color: #F6ED5D;left: 128px;top: 318px;width: 67px;height: 33px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #614023;background-color: #F6ED5D;left: 133px;top: 363px;width: 86px;height: 50px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #166B83;background-color: #9BD6E6;left: 160px;top: 439px;width: 58px;height: 26px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
それで
授業初日の
図書館に
何を?
style: font-size: 14px;color: #614023;background-color: #F6ED5D;left: 345px;top: 33px;width: 124px;height: 84px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
ここで働くの!
W-9※を出したのよ
※W-9:アメリカの一般的な課税書

style: font-size: 14px;color: #614023;background-color: #F6ED5D;left: 704px;top: 24px;width: 65px;height: 17px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #166B83;background-color: #9BD6E6;left: 685px;top: 58px;width: 80px;height: 33px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
…私はただ
クッキーを
食べに
style: font-size: 13px;color: #614023;background-color: #F6ED5D;left: 680px;top: 115px;width: 92px;height: 49px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: #166B83;background-color: #9BD6E6;left: 704px;top: 188px;width: 42px;height: 17px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
それで図書館に
早めに来たの?
style: font-size: 14px;color: #614023;background-color: #F6ED5D;left: 323px;top: 382px;width: 107px;height: 82px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
そうよ!
私は寮生だから
少し早めに
越して来たの
style: font-size: 14px;color: #166B83;background-color: #9BD6E6;left: 670px;top: 255px;width: 125px;height: 88px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
